description.summary: Delicious crispy beef tacos loaded with seasoned ground beef, fresh toppings, and tangy lime crema. A crowd-pleasing favorite that's perfect for casual entertaining or quick weeknight dinners.

preparation.step: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add ground beef and cook, breaking it up as it cooks, until browned, about 5-7 minutes. Drain excess fat if needed.
Add taco seasoning and water according to packet instructions. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Warm taco shells according to package directions.
In a small bowl, mix sour cream with lime juice and cilantro to make lime crema.
Assemble tacos: Place seasoned beef in warm shells, then top with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and lime crema.
Serve immediately with additional lime wedges and your favorite salsa.
